DOC.brief_summary: Study determine effect single dose BIRB 796 BS systemic inflammatory response induce endotoxin healthy human
DOC.brief_title: Effect Single Oral Dose BIRB 796 BS Endotoxin-induced Inflammatory Responses Healthy Human Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy male subject determine result screen Signed write informed consent accordance Good Clinical Practice local legislation Age ≥18 ≤ 35 year Broca ≥ 20 % ≤ + 20 % Able communicate well investigator comply study requirement Any find medical examination ( include blood pressure , pulse rate EKG ) deviate normal clinical relevance Gastrointestinal , hepatic , renal , respiratory , cardiovascular , metabolic , immunological hormonal disorder Surgery gastrointestinal tract ( except appendectomy ) Diseases central nervous system ( epilepsy ) psychiatric disorder neurological disorder History orthostatic hypotension , faint spell blackouts Chronic relevant acute infection within 14 day enrolment History allergy/hypersensitivity ( include drug allergy ) deem relevant trial judge investigator Intake drug long halflife ( > 24 hour ) ( < 1 month prior administration trial ) Use drug , might influence result trial ( < 10 day prior administration trial ) Participation another trial investigational drug ( < 3 month prior administration trial ) Smoker ( > 10 cigarette > 3 cigar > 3 pipes/day ) Inability refrain smoke trial day Alcohol abuse ( > 60 g/day ) Drug abuse Blood donation loss > 400 ml ( < 2 month prior administration trial ) Excessive physical activity ( < 24 hour prior administration trial ) Any laboratory value outside reference range clinical relevance History familial bleeding disorder Weight > 150 kg Prior confirm suspected receipt monoclonal antibody
